lore: Marionettes aren't alive and don't have any awareness.\n\nThe Marionette Charlatan usually stays silent, but when faced with a pile of goods, it shouts out wild claims about their magical powers, trying to catch the attention of everyone nearby. Whether it's a simple rock or dog excrement, it'll try to pass it off as a miracle cure or a sacred talisman.
menagerieDialog: (It hangs limply, awaiting its next command.)
Pull my strings and watch me dance... a dance of death!
I may be controlled, but my mind is my own. Let me share my observations with you.
You can't hurt what isn't truly alive. I am invincible!
(It's jerking about wildly, its limbs flailing in all directions.)
name: Marionette Charlatan
